duties_responsibilities.duty: Take orders, prepare and serve food, drinks, and other items to guests
Perform all cashier duties for the outlet
Strive to provide exceptional service to both internal and external guests at all times
Exemplify the Woodmark Hotel & Still Spa Culture as well as promote hotel values of Honesty, Enthusiasm, Integrity, Accountability, and Passion for Service

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required
Hospitality specialty degree or prior hospitality experience preferred
